data.text: @MatiaSantaValle Hi Matias, we are truly sorry to hear about your experience with us and apologize for the inconvenience caused in this regard. Please note that you will need to report your delayed or missing baggage at the Lost and Found desk at your arrival airport.
@utkarsh1906 Hi Utkarsh, apologies for the delayed response. Kindly requesting if you could send a private message directly if possible. We apologize for the inconvenience. Kind Regards, Sam.
@Flowermariotti Should you have done so, kindly provide us your case reference number via direct/ private message so that we may follow-up with our relevant team. Kind Regards, Sam.

urls.title: Complaints and compliments | Customer Service | SWISS
urls.description: SWISS greatly values good service and high standards of quality. If we ever fail to meet your expectations please inform us accordingly.

data.text: @Flowermariotti Furthermore, you may claim for compensation online via the website as per the link provided: https://t.co/xpTYDen1BH. Our Customer Feedback department will then review your case and revert accordingly once investigations are complete.

@Flowermariotti Hi Florencia, we are truly sorry to hear about the circumstances surrounding your missing luggage, and we apologize for the inconvenience this has caused you. Please note that you will need to contact the Lost and Found office of your arrival airport regarding your luggage.

@utkarsh1906 Hi Utkarsh, we are truly sorry to hear about your experience with us and we apologize for the inconvenience caused. Please note that we have sent you a direct message to assist you further. Kind Regards, Sam.
@whats_above_SE1 Hi, Thank you for the update. Kind Regards, Sam.

urls.title: Complaints and compliments | Customer Service | SWISS
urls.description: SWISS greatly values good service and high standards of quality. If we ever fail to meet your expectations please inform us accordingly.

data.text: @whateve28713351 Hi, thank you for your feedback, and we are sorry to hear about your experience with us. Should you wish to file a formal complaint, you may do so online via the link provided: https://t.co/xpTYDen1BH. Kind Regards, Sam.
@AboveBracknell Hi, Thank you for the update. Kind Regards, Sam.

@Talicktweets We understand the negative impact this may have caused towards your travel plans, and note that this is not our intention. However, note that safety is always to be considered. Kind Regards, Sam.

@Talicktweets Hi Author Carrie Talick, we apologize for the inconvenience caused due to your flights being delayed. Please know that delays are done for the sole reason of passenger & crew safety due to unforeseen reasons which may occur.
@brunj7 As such, you may respond back to the email and seek for advice with regards to the matter. We remain available should you have ay further questions. Kind Regards, Sam.

@brunj7 Hi Julien, we regret  that the response provided was not up to their expectation, and we understand the inconvenience this may have caused. However, SWISS has policies and procedures in place which we need to adhere to regarding the matter.
@whats_above_SE1 Hi Air Traffic @ SE1, thank you for the update. Kind Regards, Sam.

data.text: @Ronninglife Hi Ron, we do apologize for the inconvenience caused with regards to your missing baggage. Should you wish to make a formal complaint and claim for compensation, you may do so online on the website via the link provided: https://t.co/xpTYDen1BH. Kind Regards, Sam.

@chullo1954 @AskAmex Hi, thank you for your message and sorry for the late reply. Note that you should be able to benefit with an extra free baggage allowance. However, please provide me with your booking reference via private message so I may advise you accordingly.
@Happy8706206927 In the meantime I shall be happy to assist you via this platform and I request you to please send a private message with your query for further assistance

@Happy8706206927 Hi, my apologies for the delayed response and for any inconvenience caused. You are unable to reach the service center over the phone due to high volume of calls experienced by them thus a longer waiting time may be expected and I ask for your patience and understanding.
@m_maccari Hi Mariaelena, we are sorry for the inconvenience caused. However, we hope you had enjoyed your flight with us. Kind regards, Sana.
@Argi_esq Hi Argi, please be advised that you have been contacted via private message. Kind regards, Sana.

@Arman15240744 Hi@arman15240744, thank you for contacting us. Please send us your query via private message so that we may assist you accordingly. This is due to personal details that must not be disclosed on public domains. Thank you for your understanding. Kind regards, Sana.

urls.title: SWISS Saveurs
urls.description: With SWISS Saveurs, we offer you a wide range of culinary delicacies for every palate on most fl ights. Our new culinary concept on flights from Zurich and Geneva is a reflection of our commitment to serving you meals that are regional and delicious. The selection includes a range of healthy alternatives, is made from regional ingredients and comes in sustainable packaging whenever possible. The range of fresh products was created by Switzerland’s world-renowned Confiserie Sprüngli, which can look back

data.text: Our SWISS Saveurs menu goes into a new round for the fall starting September 1st. 🍂 One of the highlights are our new French "fries in the skies" with mayonnaise or vegan ketchup🍟. You can find the full menu here: https://t.co/7xuC65T4G0 #SWISSSaveurs #flyswiss https://t.co/uibEvqudGV
@palouAA Hi Serge, We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience we may have caused. Please be advised that we have assisted you via direct message. Kind regards, Noah.

urls.title: Book tickets online now and fly out into the world
urls.description: Book tickets online now and fly out into the world. ✈ From check-in to disembarking - we place the highest value on hygiene and your health.

data.text: @DomJulitaur Also you must fill out the complaints form on https://t.co/rRZh3n4TWD via the link: https://t.co/nRtiVZtEIR... in order for our Customer Feedback team to investigate and get back to you directly. Kind regards, Ariel

@DomJulitaur Hi Julien,  I am truly sorry to learn of the circumstances surrounding your experience with us thus far regarding your delayed baggage and I sincerely apologize. Please note that you are requested to contact the lost and found desk on the number provided on your report.
@epicntr_ch Hi, Thank you for your feedback.  Kind regards, Ariel
@BusTrav Hi, Kindly requesting if you could provide me with either your booking reference or e-ticket number through private message..  Kind regards, Ariel
@WillRowan5 Hi, Hi Will, Kindly requesting if you could provide me with either your booking reference or e-ticket number through private message. Kind regards, Ariel
@WillRowan5 Hi, Hi Kindly requesting if you could provide me with either your booking reference or e-ticket number through private message. Kind regards, Ariel
@upgradedpoints Thank you for your update.  Kind regards, Ariel
@mirianchela Please be assured that we will endeavor to deliver your baggage as promptly as possible. Kind regards, Ariel  Kind regards, Ariel

@mirianchela Once your baggage has been picked up by the courier it will be delivered to the address provided. Please be aware that this can take variable amount of time depending upon the number of bags to be delivered as well as the time of the day.

urls.title: Problems with your baggage
urls.description: Report immediately to the Lost & Found office if upon arrival, your baggage is damaged, too late, or you never get it back.

data.text: @mirianchela Please be assured that we will do all possible to assist you through this experience.  Have you lodged a report with the Lost & Found office? You will be issued a file reference which is used to track the status of your baggage via the tracing link below: https://t.co/LmalEN0zco

@mirianchela Hi Mirian, Thank you for contacting us regarding your baggage. We are sincerely sorry for the stress and inconvenience this has caused you. We apologize for the mishandling of your baggage and understand that this will be inconvenient for you.

urls.title: Service Center
urls.description: Do you have any questions or do you need help with your booking? Phone numbers and opening times for our local agents can be found here.

data.text: @pwlspall Hi@pwlspall, thank you for contacting us. How may we assist today?  Kind regards, Sana.
@Reds_manutd10 Hi Saumil. Please be advised that we do offer any student discounts on our flights    Kind regards, Ariel

@PauloCs56134661 Hi, Hi Helena, Regrettably, we do not have an agent who speaks your preferred language. We kindly ask that you resend your request through private message in one of the following serviced languages:  

• English
• French
• Italian
• Spanish 
• German  Kind regards, Ariel
@burtonpaul Hi Burton, Thank you for your feedback and should you have any questions please do not hesitate to contact us directly.   Kind regards, Ariel
@kevinburrows Hi Kevin, we hope you had enjoyed your trip with us and would love to welcome you back onboard SWISS again soon. Kind regards, Sana.
@richard_coxon Hi, Please be advised that we have assisted you through private message.  Kind regards, Ariel
@mirianchela Hi Mirian, please be advised that you will be updated the status of your report through the online tracing link. Kind regards, Sana.
@DomJulitaur Please be assured that we will endeavor to deliver your baggage as promptly as possible.   Kind regards, Ariel

@DomJulitaur Once your baggage has been picked up by the courier it will be delivered to the address provided. Please be aware that this can take variable amount of time depending upon the number of bags to be delivered as well as the time of the day.
